tne_1966 Tales of Pirx the Pilot Latvian ZinÄtne 1966] Poland (OpowieÅci o
pilocie Pirxie) in 1968, and translated to English in two parts (Tales of Pirx
the Pilot and More Tales of Pirx the Pilot) in 1979 and 1982, is a series of
short stories about a spaceship pilot named Pirx. They are some of the best
known works of Lem, having been added to the required curriculum for Polish junior-
high school students in the 1990s. Pirx stories can be classified as
a moderate hard science fiction with some comic elements.
